summary: All previously reported issues have been addressed and no new blocking problems were introduced.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Indexes not recreated due to name conflicts after rename
previous_issues_status.notes: Old index names are dropped before recreating on new credit_lots.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: FK verification incomplete for lot_id/source_lot_id and backup names
previous_issues_status.notes: Now enforces lot-related FK columns point to credit_lots and detects any credit_lots-named backups.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: foreign_keys state not restored to prior value
previous_issues_status.notes: Captures prior state and restores it in finally block.
